extension_description.message: Sobanura inyandiko yatoranijwe kurupapuro rwurubuga hanyuma uhindure kumiterere yihariye.

turn_off_description.message: Guhindura buto bizajya bigaragara igihe cyose inyandiko yatoranijwe

turn_on_description.message: Akabuto k'ubuhinduzi ntikagaragaza igihe inyandiko yatoranijwe ariko urashobora guhindura mugukanda ahanditse Pro Translate mugikoresho cyibikoresho

auto_switch.message: Mu buryo bwikora uhindukire kururimi rwa kabiri

auto_switch_description.message: Mugihe inyandiko yatoranijwe arirwo rurimi rwibanze, ruhindure kururimi rwa kabiri

target_format_description.message: Hitamo intego isanzwe, imiterere irashobora guhinduka mugice cyubuhinduzi

auto_set_format.message: Mu buryo bwikora shiraho imiterere isanzwe

auto_set_format_description.message: Mugihe uhinduye imiterere mubisobanuro byubuhinduzi, shyira imiterere yatoranijwe kumiterere isanzwe

format_and_order_description.message: Fata imanza zishobora guhinduka mugice cyubuhinduzi no kwerekana gahunda

translate_button_on_description.message: Guhindura buto bizajya bigaragara igihe cyose inyandiko yatoranijwe

translate_button_off_description.message: Akabuto k'ubuhinduzi ntikagaragaza igihe inyandiko yatoranijwe ariko urashobora guhindura mugukanda ahanditse Pro Translate mugikoresho cyibikoresho
